Package Control

Class ShowtimesManager

java.lang.Object
Control.ShowtimesManager
public class ShowtimesManager extends Object
Control class to perform actions on the showtimes database
Since:
2022-11-13

  • Constructor Details

    • ShowtimesManager

      public ShowtimesManager()

  • Method Details

    • createShowtimes

      public static void createShowtimes(String showtime, String moviename, String cinemaID)
      function to create showtime
      Parameters:
      showtime - showtime of "DD/MM/YYYY HH:mm" format (converted to string from LocalDateTime format)
      moviename - name of movie showing in that showtime
      cinemaID - ID of cinema in which the movie is playing at that time

    • readAllShowtimes

      public static ArrayList<Showtimes> readAllShowtimes()
      used to check through all showtimes created by admin for various functions such as showing timeslots available for user to book
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all showtimes created by admin

    • deleteShowtimes

      public static void deleteShowtimes(int index)
      To delete a showtime in the database
      Parameters:
      index - index in readAllShowtimes() ArrayList of Showtime object to be deleted

    • editShowtime

      public static void editShowtime(int index, String attribute, int cineplexID)
      to edit a specific showtime based
      Parameters:
      index - index of the showtime to edit in the ArrayList of showtimes called from readAllShowtimes()
      attribute - admin can choose to first select the showtime then edit cinema id associated to it, or first select the cinema then change the showtime associated to it
      cineplexID - if of cineplex which the showtime object belongs to

    • searchShowtimes

      public static ArrayList<Showtimes> searchShowtimes(String date, int movieid)
      filter all showtimes to output showtimes tied to the same movieid and date
      Parameters:
      date - date to be filtered by
      movieid - id of movie to be filtered by
      Returns:
      ArrayList of showtimes tied to the same movieid and date

    • updateSeats

      public static void updateSeats(int showtimeID, int row, String col)
      update seats to be assigned and store this assigned state in the database
      Parameters:
      showtimeID - id of showtime in which seating plan is associated to
      row - row of seat to be assigned
      col - column of seat to be assigned

    • moviesByCineplex

      public static ArrayList<Integer> moviesByCineplex(int cineplex)
      return movie IDs that have showtimes associated to it in that cineplex
      Parameters:
      cineplex - ID of cineplex to filter by
      Returns:
      ArrayList of movie IDs

    • showtimesByMovieAndCineplex

      public static ArrayList<Showtimes> showtimesByMovieAndCineplex(int cineplex, int movieId)
      filter all showtimes by cineplex and movie
      Parameters:
      cineplex - id of cineplex to be filtered by
      movieId - id of movie to be filtered by
      Returns:
      ArrayList of showtimes tied to that specific cineplex and movieID

    • showtimeDates

      public static ArrayList<String> showtimeDates(ArrayList<Showtimes> showtimesAvailable)
      filters a list of Showtimes objects to obtain all dates and times associated to it, without repeats
      Parameters:
      showtimesAvailable - takes in an array of Showtimes objects to filter through
      Returns:
      ArrayList of showtimes, with each showtime being a String, in the format of "DD/MM/YYYY HH:mm"
